availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas L. Sorrell (Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Richard A. Sorrell and Delphina Sorrell. Farmer in Nelson County in 1850. Farmer in Nelson County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 27A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Kentucky, 4th Congressional District, Vol. 2, 1863, p. 466, p. 169 of microfilm, (Accessed via ancestry.com on April 15, 2020).
Find A Grave, "Thomas Lewis Sorrell (1830-1894)," Memorial 29759475, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/29759475 (accessed April 15, 2020).
